author: jemenger
content:
Is there documentation of the "ceremony" for the deployment of the Eth2 deposit contract, i.e.  describing system isolation, ensuring that the bytecode generated/deployed is what you expect it to be, that the address is properly communicated, etc?

Is this something that is going to be communicated to the community?

author: jemenger
content: Not that it should be automated or anything, but it may be a good idea to have at least its basic structure known, to get feedback into the process and promote good practices. A certain level of security by obscurity may also be appropriate.
